actions.name: CreateIdentityPool
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new identity pool

actions.name: DeleteIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to delete identities from an identity pool. You can specify a list of 1-60 identities that you want to delete

actions.name: DeleteIdentityPool
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a user pool. Once a pool is deleted, users will not be able to authenticate with the pool

actions.name: DescribeIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to return metadata related to the given identity, including when the identity was created and any associated linked logins

actions.name: DescribeIdentityPool
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about a particular identity pool, including the pool name, ID description, creation date, and current number of users

actions.name: GetCredentialsForIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to return credentials for the provided identity ID

actions.name: GetId
actions.description: Grants permission to generate (or retrieve) a Cognito ID. Supplying multiple logins will create an implicit linked account

actions.name: GetIdentityPoolAnalytics
actions.description: Grants permission to get analytics data about the total current identity count for all identity pool identity provider (IdPs)

actions.name: GetIdentityPoolDailyAnalytics
actions.description: Grants permission to get analytics data about the number of new identities and total identities for all identity pool identity providers (IdPs)

actions.name: GetIdentityPoolRoles
actions.description: Grants permission to get the roles for an identity pool

actions.name: GetIdentityProviderDailyAnalytics
actions.description: Grants permission to get analytics data about the number of new identities and total identities for one identity pool identity provider (IdPs)

actions.name: GetOpenIdToken
actions.description: Grants permission to get an OpenID token, using a known Cognito ID

actions.name: GetOpenIdTokenForDeveloperIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to register (or retrieve) a Cognito IdentityId and an OpenID Connect token for a user authenticated by your backend authentication process

actions.name: GetPrincipalTagAttributeMap
actions.description: Grants permission to get the principal tags for an identity pool and provider

actions.name: ListIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to list the identities in an identity pool

actions.name: ListIdentityPools
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the Cognito identity pools registered for your account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are assigned to an Amazon Cognito identity pool

actions.name: LookupDeveloperIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the IdentityId associated with a DeveloperUserIdentifier or the list of DeveloperUserIdentifiers associated with an IdentityId for an existing identity

actions.name: MergeDeveloperIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to merge two users having different IdentityIds, existing in the same identity pool, and identified by the same developer provider

actions.name: SetIdentityPoolRoles
actions.description: Grants permission to set the roles for an identity pool. These roles are used when making calls to GetCredentialsForIdentity action

actions.name: SetPrincipalTagAttributeMap
actions.description: Grants permission to set the principal tags for an identity pool and provider. These tags are used when making calls to GetOpenIdToken action

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to assign a set of tags to an Amazon Cognito identity pool

actions.name: UnlinkDeveloperIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to unlink a DeveloperUserIdentifier from an existing identity

actions.name: UnlinkIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to unlink a federated identity from an existing account

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from an Amazon Cognito identity pool

actions.name: UpdateIdentityPool
actions.description: Grants permission to update an identity pool
